important_turns.user_message: Now I can consider my preferences without feeling pressured.
important_turns.reason: The user gained confidence in considering preferences without pressure.

context_before.assistant_message: Providing more general approaches to suggest categories.
context_before.user_message: A more general approach to suggest categories might ease my discomfort.

context_after.user_message: Now I can consider my preferences without feeling pressured.

detailed_findings.analysis: The user appreciated the shift to a more general approach, which reduced pressure and increased satisfaction.
detailed_findings.recommendation: The assistant should continue to offer flexible, user-driven guidance to enhance user comfort.

contextual_notes: The user initially struggled with decision-making due to a lack of structured options.
Satisfaction improved as the user received more detailed and personalized information.
general_insights: Providing structured yet flexible guidance can enhance user satisfaction.
Detailing implications of choices (e.g., delivery speed, cost) aids decision-making.
Encouraging users to reflect on preferences without pressure can improve satisfaction.
